analysis_notes.codebase_architecture: Static HTML/CSS/JS portfolio with embedded data structure in window.STATIC_DATA object. Uses modern web technologies including CSS Grid, Flexbox, CSS Custom Properties, and advanced animations.
analysis_notes.existing_issues_pattern: Repository contains documented issues including skills progress bar flicker, hero section layout shift, and video section feature request. Issues follow consistent documentation pattern with priority, labels, and technical details.
key_components: Navigation system with auto-hiding navbar and mobile menu
Hero section with typing animation and neural network visualization
Projects grid with hover effects and skill tags
Skills section with animated progress bars
Advanced animations including parallax and particle systems
analysis_notes.performance_considerations: Website targets 95+ Lighthouse scores with optimized animations, lazy loading, and minimal dependencies. Uses hardware-accelerated CSS and IntersectionObserver for efficient scroll animations.
analysis_notes.deployment_context: Designed for GitHub Pages deployment with static hosting requirements. No server-side dependencies in primary implementation.
analysis_notes.alternative_implementation: Flask version available in flask-version/ directory with similar functionality but server-side rendering capabilities.
